mapper.select: select stock.*,droso.*,env.* from cibr_stock_drosophila stock left join cibr_animal_drosophila droso on stock.drosophila_id = droso.id left join cibr_sys_environment env on stock.environment = env.id where stock.statu != '09' order by stock.createTime desc,droso.selfIndex,stock.contanerNmuber
mapper.insert:
insert into cibr_stock_drosophila( id, drosophila_id, contanerType, contanerNmuber, usageType, birthday, createUser, createTime, location, rawNumber, rawType, updateTime, updateUser, environment,statu,stockIndex ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drosophilaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contanertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contanernmuber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.usagetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rawnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rawtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.environment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stockindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
